questions.question: What comes next in the pattern: 2, 4, 6, 8, ?
questions.explanation: This is an even number pattern, so 10 comes next
questions.subject: Mathematics

questions.question: Which planet is closest to the Sun?
questions.explanation: Mercury is the closest planet to the Sun
questions.subject: Science

questions.question: How many continents are there on Earth?
questions.explanation: There are 7 continents: Asia, Africa, North America, South America, Antarctica, Europe, and Australia
questions.subject: Social Science

questions.question: What is the plural form of 'child'?
questions.explanation: The plural of 'child' is 'children' - it's an irregular plural
questions.subject: English
